quotes.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.quote: Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Everything you’ve ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
quotes.author: George Addair

quotes.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
quotes.author: John D. Rockefeller

quotes.quote: I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference to the world.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: Hardships often prepare ordinary people for an extraordinary destiny.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Do one thing every day that scares you.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The best way to predict the future is to invent it.
quotes.author: Alan Kay

quotes.quote: If you want to lift yourself up, lift up someone else.
quotes.author: Booker T. Washington

quotes.quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
quotes.author: Wayne Gretzky

quotes.quote: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: I attribute my success to this: I never gave or took any excuse.
quotes.author: Florence Nightingale

quotes.quote: You can't use up creativity. The more you use, the more you have.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Dream big and dare to fail.
quotes.author: Norman Vaughan

quotes.quote: Do what you can, where you are, with what you have.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: If you do what you’ve always done, you’ll get what you’ve always gotten.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: It is never too late to be what you might have been.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: Everything has beauty, but not everyone can see.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary.
quotes.author: Vidal Sassoon

quotes.quote: Opportunities don't happen. You create them.
quotes.author: Chris Grosser

quotes.quote: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
quotes.author: Sam Levenson

quotes.quote: Life is about making an impact, not making an income.
quotes.author: Kevin Kruse

quotes.quote: Whatever the mind of man can conceive and believe, it can achieve.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Two roads diverged in a wood, and I—I took the one less traveled by, And that has made all the difference.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: I attribute my success to this: I never gave or took any excuse.
quotes.author: Florence Nightingale

quotes.quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.
quotes.author: Wayne Gretzky

quotes.quote: I've missed more than 9,000 shots in my career. I've lost almost 300 games. 26 times I've been trusted to take the game-winning shot and missed. I've failed over and over and over ... . And that is why I succeed.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.quote: The most difficult thing is the decision to act, the rest is merely tenacity.
quotes.author: Amelia Earhart

quotes.quote: Every strike brings me closer to the next home run.
quotes.author: Babe Ruth

quotes.quote: Definiteness of purpose is the starting point of all achievement.
quotes.author: W. Clement Stone

quotes.quote: We must balance conspicuous consumption with conscious capitalism.
quotes.author: Kevin Kruse

quotes.quote: Life is what happens to you while you’re busy making other plans.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.quote: We become what we think about.
quotes.author: Earl Nightingale

quotes.quote: Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn’t do than by the ones you did do.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Life is 10% what happens to me and 90% of how I react to it.
quotes.author: Charles Swindoll

quotes.quote: The most common way people give up ...  don’t have any.
quotes.author: Alice Walker

quotes.quote: The mind is everything. What you think you become.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: An unexamined life is not worth living.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: Eighty percent of success is showing up.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: Your time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Winning isn’t everything, but wanting to win is.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: I am not a product of my circumstances. I am a product of my decisions.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.quote: Every child is an artist. The problem is how to remain an artist once he grows up.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: You can never cross the ocean until you have the courage to lose sight of the shore.
quotes.author: Christopher Columbus

quotes.quote: Either you run the day, or the day runs you.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Whether you think you can or you think you can’t, you’re right.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: The two most important days in your life are the day you are born and the day you find out why.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Whatever you can do, or dream you can, begin it. Boldness has genius, power and magic in it.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: The best revenge is massive success.
quotes.author: Frank Sinatra

quotes.quote: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quote: Success is no accident. It is hard work, perseverance, learning, studying, sacrifice and most of all, love of what you are doing or learning to do.
quotes.author: Pele

quotes.quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: Success isn't always about greatness. It's about consistency. Consistent hard work leads to success. Greatness will come.
quotes.author: Dwayne Johnson

quotes.quote: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: You have to believe in yourself when no one else does.
quotes.author: Serena Williams

quotes.quote: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
quotes.author: Sam Levenson

quotes.quote: Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot, but make it hot by striking.
quotes.author: William Butler Yeats

quotes.quote: The harder the conflict, the greater the triumph.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: Success is not in what you have, but who you are.
quotes.author: Bo Bennett

quotes.quote: The secret of success is to do the common thing uncommonly well.
quotes.author: John D. Rockefeller Jr.

quotes.quote: Success is getting what you want. Happiness is wanting what you get.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference to the world.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: Don't be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: Success is a journey, not a destination. The doing is often more important than the outcome.
quotes.author: Arthur Ashe

quotes.quote: The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary.
quotes.author: Vidal Sassoon

quotes.quote: Success is not to be pursued; it is to be attracted by the person you become.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Success is stumbling from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
quotes.author: Winston S. Churchill

quotes.quote: Success is not measured by what you accomplish, but by the opposition you have encountered, and the courage with which you have maintained the struggle against overwhelming odds.
quotes.author: Orison Swett Marden

quotes.quote: Success is liking yourself, liking what you do, and liking how you do it.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: The road to success and the road to failure are almost exactly the same.
quotes.author: Colin R. Davis

quotes.quote: Success is not the absence of failure; it's the persistence through failure.
quotes.author: Aisha Tyler

quotes.quote: Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day in and day out.
quotes.author: Robert Collier

quotes.quote: Success is achieved and maintained by those who try and keep trying.
quotes.author: W. Clement Stone

quotes.quote: Success is a state of mind. If you want success, start thinking of yourself as a success.
quotes.author: Joyce Brothers

quotes.quote: Success is not about the destination, it's about the journey.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Success is not something you pursue. Success is something you attract by the person you become.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: In the middle of every difficulty lies opportunity.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: Keep your face always toward the sunshine—and shadows will fall behind you.
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.quote: The only way to achieve the impossible is to believe it is possible.
quotes.author: Charles Kingsleigh

quotes.quote: Keep going. Everything you need will come to you at the perfect time.
quotes.author: Unknown
